title: Alexandera Houchin Reflects on the 2023 Tour Divide
content:
It’s Monday. While you’re sitting at your computer, hit play on this video from Chumba Cycles on Alexandera Houchin‘s 2023 record-setting run!

The post Alexandera Houchin Reflects on the 2023 Tour Divide appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
